snippet: A Chinese court has sentenced eight people to death for two separate attacks in Xinjiang that officials called terrorist operations.
abstract: Court in western China sentences eight people to death for two separate attacks that Chinese officials called terrorist operations; those sentenced all appear to be ethnic Uighurs.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese court has sentenced eight people to death for two separate attacks in Xinjiang that officials called terrorist operations.

headline.main: 8 Sentenced to Death for Attacks in Western China
headline.print_headline: China: 8 Sentenced to Death in Attacks
